testsuite.name: simulate housing credit leasing on the Bancolombia page

testcase.name: Verify the result of the simulation of a home loan
testcase.classname: simulate housing credit leasing on the Bancolombia page

testsuite.system-out:
Cuota fija en pesos $ 1.707.295
Tasa efectiva anual 9.95%
Tasa mes vencido 0.79%
Seguro de vida $ 21.551
Seguro de incendio y terremoto $ 25.397
